des: "This is a sundried tomato and fresh basil with pine nut salad dressing...also olive oil and balsamic. Use on a light romaine or a spinach salad...Dressing can be hot or cold, your choice...enjoy!"
ins: In a bowl, mix the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, sun-dried tomatoes, basil, pine nuts, water, and sugar. Cover, and refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight.
